ComicInfo.Title: Serenity's Boys
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:14:22. [Issue ID 96224]
ComicInfo.Tags: Ken Clarkson,Turok,Randy Cartier,Brother John,Sister Serenity,X-O Manowar [Aric Dacia],Ms. D'Angelo
ComicInfo.Summary: Ken Clarkson is throwing a formal Orb Industries party and everyone's invited. But while things get awkward when Aric and recently parted love interest Randy Cartier both show up with dates on their arms, they're going to get downright lethal when Sister Serenity and her ecclesiastical mercenaries crash the party!
